title: Game Spectating?
body: Stupid Question: How do I spectate people during their game. A friend wanted help playing Ekko but the "Spectate Game" options is grayed out

replies.body: I would like the spectate random game feature brought back too, please. Or make a couple of buttons in the corner where  you could choose to spectate different modes. Such as ARAM, Summoners Rift, ranked etc
it hasn't been added *yet*, which I assume means that they plan on adding the feature as the client progresses towards it's final stages. I don't believe it's been scrapped so it's alright ^-^

Short Answer: In the Legacy Client.

Long Answer: The Beta client hasn't had the Spectate feature added in just yet, but you can spectate friends by hopping back to the Legacy Client, which you can access at the login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this helps, please let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
ah thanks so much! I didn't realize it wasn't an added feature yet, but no wories :)
